text: @DrDenaGrayson @VP Mike Pence, in a coronavirus hot zone without a mask, walking around indoors with a large group of other people without masks. I wonder what's on Mr. Pence's calendar in a couple of weeks? Might want to keep some time open for a hospital stay, Mr. Pence.
